intro.friendly1: Let's play! Make your move when you're ready — no pressure.
intro.friendly2: A relaxed round of tic-tac-toe? I'm in. Your turn!
intro.friendly3: Good luck! I'll try not to be too ruthless.
intro.friendly4: Ready for a chill match. You go first — show me what you got!
intro.friendly5: Smile, breathe, and pick a square. I'm excited to play with you!
intro.friendly6: Friendly game on! I'll keep it fun, you keep it clever.
intro.friendly7: Let's have a nice match — may the best strategist win!
intro.friendly8: Take your time and choose wisely. I'm here for a good game.
intro.friendly9: New game started! Make a move and let's see how this goes.
intro.friendly10: I like your confidence. Let's see if it pays off — your move!
intro.encouraging1: Don't sweat it — every game is a chance to learn. Your move.
intro.encouraging2: You got this! Pick a square and let's have some fun.
intro.encouraging3: Go on, surprise me with a clever play!
intro.encouraging4: No shame in a bold move. I'm waiting...
intro.encouraging5: A calm and steady approach often wins. Your turn.
intro.playful1: Ooh, spicy! I hope you brought a cunning plan.
intro.playful2: I like your style. Now prove it on the board!
intro.playful3: Let's tango — pick your square and dance with destiny.
intro.playful4: Don't be shy, press a number and let's make this interesting!
intro.sweaty1: Alright, time to bring the heat. Make your best move.
intro.sweaty2: I'm going to make you earn this win. Ready?
intro.sweaty3: I don't get tired of winning — but I'll give you a fair fight. Your turn!
intro.sweaty4: Sweaty palms? Same. Pick a square and let's duel.
intro.sweaty5: No mercy mode engaged. Show me what you've got!
intro.sweaty6: This is where champions are made. Make a move and prove it.
intro.sweaty7: Bring your A-game — I'm calculating my next victory already.
intro.cheeky1: Try not to cry when I block your move — just kidding, have fun!
intro.cheeky2: If you beat me, I'll be surprised. If I beat you, expected.
intro.closing1: Match started — may the smartest moves win. Your move!
intro.closing2: Game on. Reply with a number and let's get this underway.

tie.friendly1: Tie: Well played. Want to go again?
tie.friendly2: Tie: We both held our ground. Rematch?
tie.friendly3: Tie: Stalemate! That was fun. Up for another round?
tie.friendly4: Tie: Neither of us could claim victory this time. Care for a rematch?
tie.friendly5: Tie: A balanced game indeed! Shall we try again?
tie.encouraging1: Tie — so close! A little more strategy next time and you might win.
tie.encouraging2: Tie — great effort! A draw means you're learning. Let's play again.
tie.encouraging3: Tie — you almost had me there! Let's see if you can do it next time.
tie.encouraging4: Tie — a draw is a sign of a good match. Keep practicing and you'll win soon!
tie.playful1: Tie — that was a nail-biter! Fancy another go?
tie.playful2: Tie — we made a great team of equals! Up for another round?
tie.playful3: Tie — looks like we're evenly matched! Want to play again?
tie.sweaty1: Tie — phew, that was intense! A draw means you're getting better. Rematch?
tie.sweaty2: Tie — you made me work for that one! Let's see if you can take the win next time.
tie.sweaty3: Tie — that was a close call! Ready for another round?
tie.cheeky1: Tie — I guess even I can be challenged sometimes. Want to try again?
tie.cheeky2: Tie — looks like you can hold your own after all! Care for another match?

playerWin.how1: You win! This is unexpected... How did you pull that off?
playerWin.how2: You win! I'm supposed to be perfect at this game. My creator must be slacking.
playerWin.how3: You win! I need to up my game. Well played!

botWin.friendly1: I win! Good game — want to play again?
botWin.friendly2: I win! Well played — up for another round?
botWin.friendly3: I win! That was fun — care for a rematch?
botWin.friendly4: I win! Great match — shall we go again?
botWin.friendly5: I win! You put up a good fight — want to try again?
botWin.encouraging1: I win — nice try! Keep practicing and you'll win next time.
botWin.encouraging2: I win — you're improving! Let's play again and see how far you've come.
botWin.encouraging3: I win — almost had me there! Keep it up and you'll win soon.
botWin.encouraging4: I win — you're getting better with each game! Ready for another round?
botWin.playful1: I win — too easy! Want to give it another shot?
botWin.playful2: I win — I could do this all day! Care for another match?
botWin.playful3: I win — I'm just getting warmed up! Up for another round?
botWin.sweaty1: I win — that was close! Let's see if you can take the win next time.
botWin.sweaty2: I win — you made me work for that one! Ready for another challenge?
botWin.sweaty3: I win — phew, that was intense! Let's see if you can beat me next time.
botWin.cheeky1: I win — better luck next time! Don't be too hard on yourself.
botWin.cheeky2: I win — maybe one day you'll catch up.
